description:
From first chair to the top of the uptrack, these ski socks provides comfort and warmth for all-mountain winter activities. The thin fabric reduces bulk inside ski boots and provides cushioning where you want it.

  • Thermolite® Core hollow fibres regulate temperature and breathability
  • Ski boot adapted cushioning on feet and shins
  • Flex system at arches and ankle to eliminate bunching and slipping
  • Flat toe seams won’t irritate
name: Kombi Reckless Adult Socks - Unisex
